channel.title: Nine-Tailed Fox
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Nine-Tailed Fox" - Starting HP and peacetime modifier.

item.title: Nine-Tailed Fox
item.content:encoded:
First thread. The Nine-Tailed Fox's page lists it's HP as "???". I didn't want to just make a change to it's page without input from others.

"_____ has summoned a Nine-Tailed Fox to your village! Your entire village has 7 days to defeat it (4120 HP - a bonus of +120 HP for attacking a Peaceful Village!) for a great bonus, or else disaster will befall you!"

Base HP: 4000 + 120 HP per day of peacetime.

Is this the same for others?
